sections.summary: an experienced cad and gis technician able to produce detailed drawings and maps which are clear and accurate. i am able to analyze databases and generate custom maps and reports with different tools of the trade. i am always curious to learn new skills and technologies that enhance my productivity in a complex organization. adaptable to work for long periods and under the most stressed situations without losing focus and patience. highlights operating systems: windows xp/ vista/7 arcgis 9.3.1, 10.0 c# (basic) telvent arcfm 9.3.1/10.0.3 java (basic) arcgis extensions autocad (2008 - 2013) arc toolbox autocad map 3d 2008 enghouse networks 4.7.1 3d studio max 2009 erdas imagine 9.3 revit 2009 microsoft office (up to 2010) geoexplorer 6000 series geoxh gps pathfinder office software magellan mobile mapper 6 basic surveying principles ms project remote sensing garmin oregon 550 adobe cs4 (photoshop, indesign, illustrator) google earth google sketchup (up to ver. 7) clinometer microstation (basic) able to lift, push, pull and carry 40 pounds or more languages: armenian
